column2: "Na emi dze
column3: Medianyi Darius n'afe a odzi kan no mu no migyinaa dɛ murusuo no mu mahyɛ no dzen."

column2: "Na afei na mebɛkyerɛ wo nokwar no. Hwɛ
column3: ahemfo baasa bɛda ho asoɛr wɔ Persia; na dza otsia anan no benya noho asen nkaa no nyinara; na sɛ n'ahonya ma no ho yɛ dzen a
column4: obekenyan adze nyina etsia Griis ahenman."

column2: "Na ɔhen tumfo bi bɔsoɛr a ɔdze tumdzi kɛse bedzi hen
column3: na ɔayɛ dza ɔpɛ."

column2: "Na oetsim
column3: no n'ahendzi bɔbɔ
column4: na wɔakyekyɛ mu afa ɔsor mframa anan afamu; na wɔremmfa mma n'asefo
column5: eso ɔrennyɛ dɛ mbrɛ no tumdzi a ɔdze dzii hen no tse; na wobotutu n'ahendzi
column6: woekwetsi yinom na wɔdze ama binom."

column2: "Na pomu afamu hen no no ho bɛyɛ dzen
column3: na n'asafohemfo no mu baako; na no ho bɛyɛ dzen asen no
column4: na oenya tumdzi; no tumdzi bɛyɛ tumdzi kɛse."

column2: "Na mfe bi ekyir no
column3: wɔbɛfefa hɔnho anyɛnko; na pomu afamu hen ne babaa bɛba kwaamu afamu hen nkyɛn dɛ ɔnye no rebɛyɛ asomdwee: na ɔremma ne basa ahoɔdzen no nka no ho; na ɔno na ne basa rinngyina; na obeyi ɔbaa no
column4: na hɔn a wɔdze no bae no
column6: na nyia ɔhyɛɛ no dzen wɔ mber no mu no ama."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no no ndwow mu mfɛwee bi mu na obi bɔsoɛr esuo n'ananmu a ɔbɛba dɔm no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔahɛn kwaamu afamu ɔhen n'abankɛse no mu
column4: na ɔnye hɔn ako

column2: "na ɔbɔsoa hɔn abosom
column3: nye hɔn ehonyi a woegu
column4: na hɔn dwetɛ na sika nkɔɔpow fɛɛfɛw no
column5: ndɔmmum akɔ Egypt; na ɔbɔtwe no ho mfe bi efi kwaamu afamu ɔhen no ho."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba pomu afamu ɔhen no n'ahenman mu dze
column3: naaso ɔbɛsan akɔ nankasa n'asaase do."

column2: "Na ne mba bedzi ako
column3: na wɔaboa dɔm akɛse pii ano a wobeyir apram do dɛ nsu: na wɔbɛsan ebedzi ako ekodu n'abankɛse no ho mpo."

column2: "Na pomu afamu hen n'enyi bɛber
column3: na oepue nye kwaamu afamu hen no akɔko; na kwaamu afamu hen no dze nyimpadodow kɛse begyina hɔ
column4: naaso wobedzi nkogu."

column2: "Na pomu afamu hen no bɔsoɛr
column3: na n'akoma ama noho do: na ɔbɛka mpem du du egu famu
column4: naaso orinndzi nyim nnkyɛr."

column2: "Na kwaamu afamu hen no bɛsan dze nyimpadodow a wɔdɔɔ so sen kan no dze no ebegyina; na ɔdze rokɔ mfe bi ekyir no
column3: ɔbɛsan dze dɔm kɛse na ndzɛmba pii aba."

column2: "Na mber no mu no
column3: pii bɔsoɛr etsia pomu afamu hen no; nkyii so wo man mu akakabemfo mba bɛmema hɔnho do dɛ wɔbɛma enyido adzehu no etsim; na wɔbɔhwehwe ase."

column2: "Nna kwaamu afamu hen no bɛba abɔhɔr pempe
column3: na ɔafa kurow a ɔagye ho ban dzendzen no: na pomu afamu akofo
column4: anaa no dɔm a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no runntum nngyina

column2: "Na nyia ɔbɛba no do no bɛyɛ dza nankasa pɛ
column3: na obiara nnkotum n'enyim gyina. Na obegyina asaase fɛɛfɛw no do
column4: na ɔdze ne nsa asɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔdze besi n'enyim dɛ ɔdze n'ahenman ahoɔdzen nyina reba
column3: na tɔɔtsenyɛfo ka no ho; na ɔbɛyɛ n'apɛdze: na ɔdze mbaa babaa no ama no
column4: dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ no; na orinngyina

column2: "Iyi ekyir no ɔbɛdan n'enyi akɔ nsupruw do
column3: na ɔafa dodowara: na ɔsafohen bi bɛma oegyaa ahorohoraa a ɔhyɛ no hyɛ; naaso mpo
column4: ɔbɛma n'ahorohoraa no adan ebua nankasa n'etsifi."

column2: "Nna ɔbɛdan n'enyi akɔ nankasa n'asaase do akoban no do: naaso obefintsiw ahwe ase
column3: na worunnhu no."

column2: "Na obi bɔsoɛr egyina n'ananmu a ɔbɛma towgyegyenyi pempensinyi bi edua ɔman no n'enyimnyam mu; na wɔbɛsɛɛ no nda kumaabi mu
column3: nnyɛ ebufuw mu
column4: anaa ɔko mu a."

column2: "Na ɔkwasampanyi bi bɔsoɛr n'ananmu a wɔmmfaa ahendzi no n'enyimnyam mmaa no: na ɔbɛba no ahodweber mu
column3: na ɔdze adzɛfɛdzɛfɛsɛm ebosuo ahendzi no mu."

column2: "Na ɔdze nsuyirii abasa bɛpram hɔn efi n'enyim
column3: na woebubu hɔn; nyew
column4: ahyɛmu safohen no so"

column2: "Na nkabɔmu a wɔnye no bɛyɛ no ekyir
column3: ɔbɛyɛ no ndaadaa mu: na ɔbɔfow aba
column4: na ɔdze dɔm kakrabaa bi bɛba abɛyɛ dzen."

column2: "Ahodweber mu na obotu aba asaase no do mbrɛ ɔyɛ fɔɔfɔɔ; na ɔbɛyɛ dza n'egyanom
column3: anaa n'egyanom hɔn egyanom nnyɛɛ pɛn; ɔbɛpetse afodze
column4: na asadze
column6: ɔbɛhyehyɛ ne tsirmu nhyehyɛɛ wɔ akoban no mu ma ekodu ber bi."

column2: "Na ɔdze dɔm kɛse bekenyan no tum na ne ndam etsia pomu afamu hen no; na pomu afamu hen dze dɔm a ɔyɛ dzen pii pa botu sa abɔko: naaso orinngyina
column3: osiandɛ wɔbɔkɔ ne tsir do apam."

column2: "Ɛhɛɛ
column3: hɔn a wodzi n'edziban na wɔbɛsɛɛ no
column4: na no dɔm no bɛpram do na atɔfo pii ahwehwe ase."

column2: "Na ahemfo beenu no dze
column3: hɔn akoma bɛyɛ emumuyɛ
column4: na wɔbɛka atorsɛm wɔ edzidzipon kor do: na orunnwie yie; na ewiei no bɛba ara wɔ ber a wɔahyɛ."

column2: "Nna kwaamuhen no dze ahodze kɛse bɛsan akɔ nankasa n'asaase do; naaso n'akoma betsia ahyɛmu krɔnkrɔn no
column3: na ɔayɛ n'apɛdze
column4: na ɔasan akɔ nankasa n'asaase do."

column2: "Ber a wɔahyɛ no mu na ɔbɛsan aba pomu afamu; na ekyir dze no rennyɛ dɛ kan dze no."
"Na Kittim ahɛn bɛba no do; na n'akoma botu na ɔasan
column3: na oenya ebufuw wɔ ahyɛmu krɔnkrɔn no do
column4: na ɔayɛ n'apɛdze: ɔbɛsan mpo
column5: na n'enyi aba hɔn a wɔapow ahyɛmu krɔnkrɔn no do."

column2: "Na ɔdze nsordaafo begyina n'afamu
column3: na wobogu krɔnkrɔn bea no ho fi
column4: mekyerɛ abankɛse no mpo
column5: na woeyi daa ɔhyew afɔr no wɔ hɔ
column6: na wɔdze amamfoyɛ ekyiwadze a ɔbɔ man no ebesi hɔ."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔbɔ ahyɛmu no ho mbusu no
column3: ɔdze adzɛfɛdzɛfɛw bɛsɛɛ hɔn: naaso ɔman a wonyim hɔn Nyankopɔn no dze
column4: hɔn ho bɛyɛ dzen

column2: "Na ɔman no mu hɔn a wonyim nyansa no
column3: wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ nyimpa pii: naaso wɔbɔtotɔ afona ano na ogyaframee mu
column4: ndɔmmumfa na afofa mu

column2: "Na sɛ wɔbɔhwehwe ase a
column3: wɔdze mboa kakrabaa bi bɔboa hɔn: na nyimpa pii dze adzɛfɛdzɛfɛw dze hɔnho bɛbata hɔn ho."

column2: "Na hɔn mu binom a wɔyɛ enyansafo no
column3: wɔbɔtotɔ
column4: dɛ wɔrosɔ hɔn ahwɛ
column7: ekesi ewiei aber no do: osiandɛ ɔbɛkyɛr ekodu aber a wɔahyɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔhen no bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ; na ɔbɛma noho do
column3: na oedzi bosom biara do ekromponsɛm
column4: na wɔaka anwanwasɛm etsia enyame mu Nyame: na obesi no yie ara ekodu dɛ ebufuhyew no bɛsa; na dza woesua apaa do no

column2: "Eso orummbu n'egyanom abosom anaa mbaa hɔn ahwehwɛdze no bi
column3: eso orummbu bosom biara bi. Na obohuhor noho wɔ adze nyina do."

column2: "Na n'ananmu na obedzi abankɛse bosom no nyi: na bosom a n'egyanom nnyim no no na ɔdze sika
column3: na dwetɛ
column4: na aboɔdzembo

column2: "Na ɔdze bosom nanaben no mboa bɛyɛ abankɛse dzendzenndzen no ho adze; obiara a obu no bi no
column3: ɔdze enyimnyam bɛyɛ no kɛse: na ɔbɛma woedzi dodowara do tum
column4: na wɔakyɛ asaase no ayɛ akatua."

column2: "Na ewiei ber no mu na pomu afamu hen no ɔnye no befimfen: na kwaamu afamu hen no dze ntseaseanam
column3: na mpɔnkɔdofo
column4: na ahɛn pii bɛba no do dɛ kyinehyia mframa; na ɔbɛkɛhɛn nkurow nkurow no mu

column2: "Ɔbɛhɛn asaase fɛɛfɛw no so do
column3: na wobobutuw nkurow nkurow pii: na yinom dze
column4: wɔbɛgye hɔn efi ne nsamu: Edom

column2: "Ɔbɛtsen ne nsa so wɔ nkurow nkurow no do: na Egypt asaase nnkefi nsa."
"Na obenya sika na dwetɛ akoradze na Egypt ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo nyinara edzi do tum: na Libiyafo na Etiopiafo bedzi n'anamɔn ekyir"
"Na nsɛm a ofi boka na kwaamu afamu bɛhaw no: na ɔdze enyiber kɛse epue akɔ dɛ ɔrekɛsɛɛ na ɔadwerew nyimpa pii huntuhuntu."
"Na ɔdze n'ahemfi ntamadan no besi po na enyimnyam bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no ntamu; naaso ɔbɛba n'ewiei
column3: na obiara rommboa no."
